name: Simple Golfing
description:
Simple Golfing - is a simple physical casual game in which your task is to throw the ball higher and higher on different objects to the top, getting to which you will win. As I said the game is simple, perhaps you will understand this yourself when you fall in the 100th time from the middle of the path. But do not worry, you will not die in this game, try again... and then again.



-Calm gameplay

-Pleasant graphics

-Sad music

-Just one level
